intro: Cistus sintenisii, commonly known as the Sintenis rockrose, is a shrub native to the Mediterranean region, particularly found in rocky and arid habitats. It belongs to the genus Cistus, which is part of the family Rubiaceae, known for its diverse range of shrubs and herbs. Cistus sintenisii is also valued for its ecological role in supporting local biodiversity and its potential use in traditional medicine.
